summary: A suite of unit tests covering a wide range of AWS Directory Service operations—such as trust creation/deletion, alias management, directory lifecycle actions, SSO enable/disable, limit queries, AD Connect handling, Microsoft AD scenarios, simple AD creation, and resource tagging—implemented with boto3 and Moto to mock AWS services.
business_intent: Ensure that all Directory Service functionalities are correctly implemented and robust against both expected usage and edge‑case errors, providing confidence that directory provisioning, management, and tagging work reliably in production.
